hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select a0 from R_2001_10_2001Temp where c7=:userName group by A0
select C1 from R_2001_10_2001 where C8=:Cid
select count(*) from R_2001_10_2001 where C7='#loginUid'
select C1 as [Uid],A11 as LevelCode, A12 as FunctionName,A13 as NextNodeNumber,A14 as ActionName from R_2001_10_1002 where A11 like '#code%' and len(A11)=#lencode

select top #size * from ( select *,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) as rowsnumber from ( select distinct #ColName,a.C6 as 所属单位,a.C1 from R_2001_10_2001 a inner join #tableName b on a.c1=b.c6 #strWhere) as Tquery) as T where T.rowsnumber>#rowsNuber
select count( distinct a.c1) from R_2001_10_2001 a inner join #tableName b on a.c1=b.c6 #strWhere
select c6 from dbo.R_2001_10_2001 where c7=:strGuid
select A17 as sText,A17 as sValue from R_2001_10_2001 where c6 like '#company%' group by A17
select A50 as sText,A50 as sValue from R_2001_10_2001_{0}Error group by A50
